alert.note: Alert for Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:11AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Escambia, southeastern Conecuh, Covington, Okaloosa, Santa Rosa and northwestern Escambia Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 310 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Castleberry to 11 miles west of Molino. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crestview, Andalusia, Milton, Opp, Brewton, Florala, Century, Flomaton, Bagdad, Baker, East Brewton, Molino, River Falls, Castleberry, Jay, Red Level, Laurel Hill, Lockhart, Heath and Pollard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southwestern Alabama.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
